name: searchGroceryProducts
description: Search packaged food products, such as frozen pizza or Greek yogurt.

minCalories.description: The minimum amount of calories the product must have.

maxCalories.description: The maximum amount of calories the product can have.

minCarbs.description: The minimum amount of carbohydrates in grams the product must have.

maxCarbs.description: The maximum amount of carbohydrates in grams the product can have.

minProtein.description: The minimum amount of protein in grams the product must have.

maxProtein.description: The maximum amount of protein in grams the product can have.

minFat.description: The minimum amount of fat in grams the product must have.

maxFat.description: The maximum amount of fat in grams the product can have.

addProductInformation.description: If set to true, you get more information about the products returned.

offset.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 900).

number.description: The maximum number of items to return (between 1 and 100). Defaults to 10.
